name: Jump Rope Rush
description:
Jump over the rope as it continues to turn. How long can you last?

Press X to jump. Use the Left/Right Arrow Keys to move. The rope will randomize its speed later on, so stay alert.

Made for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam. Rudimentary graphics, no sound, no flair... but I had a deadline to meet. I might come back to this later. #stopwaitingforgodot
